title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published to npm as “ollama”.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI; supports sync & async streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama as a native LLM & embeddings provider inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama (ChatGPT-style UI) with multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: NPM-published CLI that wraps Ollama for inline code completion and shell assistance.

title: chainlit-ollama-example
summary: Official Chainlit template showing how to build a chat UI backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented-Generation repo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes: function calling, fine-tune adapters, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama, published to Maven Central; supports streaming & embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with both REST and gRPC variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and more.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate (crates.io: ollama) providing async bindings.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API, distinct from the official ollama package.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to any local Ollama model with markdown & code highlighting.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers query Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with generated structs and streaming support.

title: r/ollama - “Show HN: Ollama Tools Ecosystem Roundup”
summary: Reddit discussion aggregating new libraries & integrations for Ollama (LangChain, Haystack, Go, Rust, etc.).
